metadata.Title: CVE-2017-11608 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description:
There is a heap-based buffer over-read in the Sass::Prelexer::re_linebreakfunction in lexer.cpp in LibSass 3.4.5. A crafted input will lead to aremote denial of service attack.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-11608` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libsass1 - 3.4.8-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libsass package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.4.8-1').
